ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "M4"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "M4")), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M5"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M6"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M7"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4-") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid next stage from M4. Allowed: M5, M6, M7, M4-.
